helpgrid.innerhtml: Enter the asset numbers for the new hierarchy created from the item assembly structure in the table window, or click Autonumber All to generate asset numbers for each row.
Select the receipts that you want to void. Receipts that are not available to void do not appear.
Enter an asset number. To generate one, click Autonumber. To apply an item assembly structure to an asset record, click .
Select the receipts that you want to void. Receipts that are not available to void do not appear.
